definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Please ask her about the fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 请问问她关于时装表演会的情况。

sentences.english: You'll have to book early if you want to see that fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 你要想看那场时装表演的话，就得早点儿定座位。

sentences.english: Susan:She's going to fashion show here in the city tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她明天要去参加实力的一个时装表演。

sentences.english: We went to the fashionable dree show yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我们去了一场时装表演。

sentences.english: She's going to watch a fashion show tomorrow evening.
sentences.chinese: 她明晚打算去看时装表演。

sentences.english: The class 1, Grade 7 students are having a fashion show in the school hall.
sentences.chinese: 七年级一班的学生在学校大厅举行时装表演。

sentences.english: In fact, some of these textile innovations are appearing on the catwalk.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，有些纺织品创新正在登上时装表演的舞台。

sentences.english: The fashion show is in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分钟后时装表演就开始了。

sentences.english: The Chinese fashion show caused a sensation in Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 中国时装表演在莫斯科引起轰动。

sentences.english: Star-chasing teenage girls usually like fashion shows.
sentences.chinese: 追星族的少女一般都喜欢时装表演。

sentences.english: The models at the fashion looked very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 在时装表演中，模特那看上去非矗漂谅。

sentences.english: The fashion show was a technicolour extravaganza .
sentences.chinese: 那时装表演是艳丽色彩的大汇展。

sentences.english: Diana is modeling for a fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 戴安娜正在时装表演会上当模特。

definition: a fashion show/to walk the runway (in a fashion show)
